verses.verse: And the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> assembled <S%H6950>together<s%> at <S%H7887>Shiloh,<s%> and set <S%H7931>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%> And the <S%H776>land<s%> was <S%H3533>subdued<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them.

And there <S%H3498>remained<s%> among the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7626>tribes,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> had <S%H3808>not<s%> yet <S%H2505>received<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> How <S%H5704>long<s%> <S%H575><s%> are <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H7503>slack<s%> to <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> you?

Give <S%H3051><s%> out from among you <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> for each <S%H7626>tribe:<s%> and I will <S%H7971>send<s%> them, and they shall <S%H6965>rise,<s%> and <S%H1980>go<s%> through the <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H3789>describe<s%> it <S%H6310>according<s%> to the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of them; and they shall <S%H935>come<s%> again <S%H413>to<s%> me.

And they shall <S%H2505>divide<s%> it into <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H2506>parts:<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> shall <S%H5975>abide<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> their <S%H1366>coast<s%> on the <S%H4480>south,<s%> <S%H5045><s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> shall <S%H5975>abide<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> their <S%H1366>coasts<s%> on the <S%H4480>north.<s%> <S%H6828><s%>

Ye <S%H859><s%> shall therefore <S%H3789>describe<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> into <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H2506>parts,<s%> and <S%H935>bring<s%> the description <S%H2008>hither<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> me, that I may <S%H3384>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots<s%> for you <S%H6311>here<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God.<s%>

But <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> have <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2506>part<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> you; <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3550>priesthood<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is their <S%H5159>inheritance:<s%> and <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> and <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> and <S%H2677>half<s%> the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> have <S%H3947>received<s%> their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H4480>beyond<s%> <S%H5676><s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> on the <S%H4217>east,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> them.

And the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and went <S%H1980>away:<s%> and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6680>charged<s%> <S%H853><s%> them that <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H3789>describe<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H1980>Go<s%> and <S%H1980>walk<s%> through the <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H3789>describe<s%> it, and come <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> me, that I may <S%H6311>here<s%> <S%H7993>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots<s%> for you <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in <S%H7887>Shiloh.<s%>

And the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> and passed <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H3789>described<s%> it by <S%H5892>cities<s%> into <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H2506>parts<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> a <S%H5612>book,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> again <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H4264>host<s%> at <S%H7887>Shiloh.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7993>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots<s%> for them in <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H2505>divided<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> according to their <S%H4256>divisions.<s%>

And the <S%H1486>lot<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families:<s%> and the <S%H1366>coast<s%> of their <S%H1486>lot<s%> came <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph.<s%>

And their <S%H1366>border<s%> on the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan;<s%> and the <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H3802>side<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> on the north <S%H4480>side,<s%> <S%H6828><s%> and went <S%H5927>up<s%> through the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H3220>westward;<s%> and the goings <S%H8444>out<s%> thereof <S%H1961>were<s%> at the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H1007>Beth-aven.<s%>

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H5674>over<s%> from <S%H4480>thence<s%> <S%H8033><s%> toward <S%H3870>Luz,<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H3802>side<s%> of <S%H3870>Luz,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> is <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> <S%H5045>southward;<s%> and the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H3381>descended<s%> to <S%H5853>Ataroth-adar,<s%> <S%H5921>near<s%> the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> lieth on the south <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H5045><s%> of the <S%H8481>nether<s%> <S%H1032>Beth-horon.<s%>

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> was <S%H8388>drawn<s%> thence, and <S%H5437>compassed<s%> the <S%H6285>corner<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H5045>southward,<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> lieth <S%H592>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H1032>Beth-horon<s%> <S%H5045>southward;<s%> and the goings <S%H8444>out<s%> thereof <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H413>at<s%> <S%H7154>Kirjath-baal,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> is <S%H7157>Kirjath-jearim,<s%> a <S%H5892>city<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah:<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> was the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>quarter.<s%>

And the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H6285>quarter<s%> was from the <S%H4480>end<s%> <S%H7097><s%> of <S%H7157>Kirjath-jearim,<s%> and the <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> on the <S%H3220>west,<s%> and went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H4599>well<s%> of <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H5318>Nephtoah.<s%>

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> came <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> lieth <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2011>Hinnom,<s%> and <S%H834>which<s%> is in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of the <S%H7497>giants<s%> on the <S%H6828>north,<s%> and <S%H3381>descended<s%> to the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H2011>Hinnom,<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H3802>side<s%> of <S%H2983>Jebusi<s%> on the <S%H5045>south,<s%> and <S%H3381>descended<s%> to <S%H5883>En-rogel,<s%>

And was <S%H8388>drawn<s%> from the <S%H4480>north,<s%> <S%H6828><s%> and went <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H5885>En-shemesh,<s%> and went <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> <S%H1553>Geliloth,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is over <S%H5227>against<s%> the going <S%H4608>up<s%> of <S%H131>Adummim,<s%> and <S%H3381>descended<s%> to the <S%H68>stone<s%> of <S%H932>Bohan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%>
And <S%H5674>passed<s%> along <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H3802>side<s%> over <S%H4136>against<s%> <S%H6160>Arabah<s%> <S%H6828>northward,<s%> and went <S%H3381>down<s%> unto Arabah: <S%H6160><s%>

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> passed <S%H5674>along<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H3802>side<s%> of <S%H1031>Beth-hoglah<s%> <S%H6828>northward:<s%> and the <S%H8444>outgoings<s%> of the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H413>at<s%> the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H3956>bay<s%> of the <S%H4417>salt<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H413>at<s%> the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H7097>end<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan:<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> was the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H1366>coast.<s%>

And <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> was the <S%H1379>border<s%> of it on the <S%H6924>east<s%> <S%H6285>side.<s%> <S%H2063>This<s%> was the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> by the <S%H1367>coasts<s%> thereof round <S%H5439>about,<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%>

Now the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H3405>Jericho,<s%> and <S%H1031>Beth-hoglah,<s%> and the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H7104>Keziz,<s%>
And <S%H1026>Beth-arabah,<s%> and <S%H6787>Zemaraim,<s%> and <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%>
And <S%H5761>Avim,<s%> and <S%H6511>Parah,<s%> and <S%H6084>Ophrah,<s%>
And <S%H3726>Chephar-haammonai,<s%> and <S%H6078>Ophni,<s%> and <S%H1387>Gaba;<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their villages: <S%H2691><s%>
Gibeon, <S%H1391><s%> and <S%H7414>Ramah,<s%> and <S%H881>Beeroth,<s%>
And <S%H4708>Mizpeh,<s%> and <S%H3716>Chephirah,<s%> and <S%H4681>Mozah,<s%>
And <S%H7552>Rekem,<s%> and <S%H3416>Irpeel,<s%> and <S%H8634>Taralah,<s%>

And <S%H6762>Zelah,<s%> <S%H507>Eleph,<s%> and <S%H2983>Jebusi,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> is <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H1394>Gibeath,<s%> and <S%H7157>Kirjath;<s%> <S%H702>fourteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages.<s%> <S%H2063>This<s%> is the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%>
